eu.europa.esig.dss.x509

Class SignaturePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.europa.esig.dss.x509.SignaturePolicy

  • public class SignaturePolicy
extends Object
    Represents the value of a SignaturePolicy

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Field Detail

      • NO_POLICY

        public static final String NO_POLICY
        The validation process accepts no policy. No particular treatment is done.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANY_POLICY

        public static final String ANY_POLICY
        The validation process accepts any policy. The used policy is only showed, no particular treatment is done.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IMPLICIT_POLICY

        public static final String IMPLICIT_POLICY
        See Also:
